script.title: syslog-int-desc-on-link-change.slax
script.author: rdelancy
script.synopsis: Send a syslog message with interface descriptiong when a link status changes from up to down or down to up.
script.description: The requirement is that when a link status changes from up to down or down to up, send a syslog message with the interface description. You can also generate a new SNMP trap based on the newly created syslog message.
